messages.subject: PA unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: A few months back, someone had said they were in PA and would love to find some other unschoolers. Was it at this list? I got in touch with an unschooling
messages.messageBody:
A few months back, someone had said they were in PA and would love to find some other unschoolers. Was it at this list? I got in touch with an unschooling aquaintance in PA and he gave me a couple of links...one for the eclectic support group his family attends (in the Scranton/Wilkes-Barr area) and one for the PA unschoolers network.
If it was someone at this list, could you write me and I'll email the links to ya?

Ren

messages.subject: PA unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/16/02 9:51:53 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/16/02 9:51:53 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Unless there's another group of Bryants, the Bryant case was in MA not PA.
>>

Oops. My mistake.
I just hear this horror stories to only find out details that make me see
where the whole mess could have been avoided.
Not that it makes what happened excusable!
I have been on the PA track lately with questions coming to the Altlearn Map
project about that state, I just remember the Bryant family as being
there......feeling like Tia with Swiss cheese for brains. :)
You couldn't pay me enough to live in that state.

Ren
"Knowledge will not always take the place of simple observation."
~Arnold Lobel
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] PA unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ... Unless there s another group of Bryants, the Bryant case was in MA not PA. Joyce
messages.messageBody:
on 12/16/02 5:24 PM, starsuncloud@... at starsuncloud@... wrote:

> If this is the story of the Bryant family, there is more to it than what
> you're posting here.

Unless there's another group of Bryants, the Bryant case was in MA not PA.

Joyce

messages.subject: Re: PA unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: No, I wasn t talking about the Bryant family.  Actualy, this case wasn t in any newspapers at all. Sheila ... though. ... parked in ... in ... than what ...
messages.messageBody:
No, I wasn't talking about the Bryant family. Actualy, this case
wasn't in any newspapers at all.
Sheila

Kristen

you're posting here.

Ren

messages.subject: PA unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone; I was wondering if there are PA homeschoolers on the list. I have some questions about homeschooling/unschooling there, and would appreciate
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone;
I was wondering if there are PA homeschoolers on the list. I have
some questions about homeschooling/unschooling there, and would
appreciate any information. Please feel free to email privately.
TIA,
Sheree
